text: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَيُدْخِلُهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

translation.en.sahih: So as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, their Lord will admit them into His mercy. That is what is the clear attainment.
translation.id.indonesian: Adapun orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan amal saleh maka Tuhan mereka memasukkan mereka ke dalam rahmat-Nya (surga). Itulah keberuntungan yang nyata.
